TopicTitle: I'm not new here either, but I also have a new username.

Articles.Content: Hey, everyone. I used to be Jeb_Kerman, but now the mods are putting a ban on Jeb / Bill / Bob usernames, so I've changed to Anomalous_Matter. Fortunately, I still got to keep my post count and such Just thought I'd inform people in case there was any confusion in the future.
